name: Silver Linked Bracelet
review: Stores always nice and clean, friendly customer service always helping and showing around if i cannot find something.

name: Close-Up Photo of Wristwatch
review: Great customer service. Even when there was a problem with paperwork the employees continued helping us and fixed the issue. Very patient workers and quick, easy and painless process

name: Round Silver Colored Fossil
review: Best customer service. I really appreciate all the efforts that (EN). From customer service department he put on solving my issue. I was pleasantly surprised. Great work!

name: Used Round Silver-colored
review: The customer services lady was so helpful! She wouldn’t give up until she had found a solution in their computer records. She really went above and beyond, I would give her 6 stars if I could.

name: Round Silver-colored Analog
review: Customer service is obviously their strategy and it shows. I have referred others already.
